column4: on EXT3 partition, system monitor reports 17.2GiB free but only 5.5GiB available.  What gives?  I heard that you don't run defrag because it's supposed to manage itself (?!?)... how do I clean/reclaim to get the other 12-ish GiB available ???
that is strange, I have my frees and availables close enough. May be you are running some strange program.

i have been pushing my limit and have moved files off, only to re-fill, then move off, etc... it is acting like a fragmented drive in that regard... curious.  but i am low on space and need what i can squeeze out.
I think a right click on the border adjust things, try it please
